name: SpookyHunt
description:
You can customize the volume and mouse sensitivity by pressing [TAB] during gameplay, or by pressing the settings icon in the main menu.

SpookyHunt is a game-jam project for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam.

Control a ghost, fly freely, move through walls, possess the furniture, and scare the mansion's residents. You have one night to try to scare all of them off!

Controls:
  • TAB - pause game/open settings
  • W, A, S, D - ghost movement
  • SPACE - fly upwards
  • LEFT-SHIFT - fly downwards
  • E  - possess nearby furniture
  • Q - stop possession
  • LEFT-CLICK - furniture action
  • SCROLLWHEEL - camera distance
Story:

You suddenly wake up from a long slumber and find out that you're a ghost. It looks like some strangers moved into your mansion while you were dead. You'd love to become their friend but they can't see you. Maybe if you move the furniture and cause them to faint, their spirits will come out to play with you. Try to make as many friends as you can, after all, you only have one night!

Information:

The entire project was made in a week during the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam by Oleg Magarill and Shoham Tzubery. In order to achieve a unique stylized look, we programmed custom shaders and modeled the entire project ourselves!
